thread.title: D & D Snyder
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by D & D Snyder

author: D & D Snyder
title: D & D Snyder
text: The Mrs. and I casually entered store to look at accessory items. We came across a very nice bar-stool we weren't necessarily looking to replace but were then offered a nice value price and were able to apply a recent delivery charge to get next-day delivery-setup .. no extra charge. They really seem to want your business and will do all possible to get best deal.
